description: The Nova cinderclient function can log the auth token from the context when in debug mode.
title: cinderclient function logs auth token

comments.content: The Nova cinderclient function can log the auth token from the context when in debug mode.

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/10288
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/543aba72e15fb6d37043d009b5478240942678fd
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 543aba72e15fb6d37043d009b5478240942678fd
Author: Dan Prince <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Jul 25 14:28:40 2012 -0400

    Don't log debug auth token when using cinder.
    
    Updates a log messages in the Nova cinderclient function so
    it doesn't log the auth token from the request context.
    
    Also properly localizes the log message.
    
    Fixes LP Bug #1029049.
    
    Change-Id: I89120f0e9b7a33c00b9b4b629d61d44d0e9b518f
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
